identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Clinical Zen' aesthetic that balances medical authority with modern SaaS fluidity. Avoid sterile hospital whites and generic blue gradients.

colors.rules: No large gradients. Use solid colors or extremely subtle mesh gradients (max 5% opacity). Text must be Slate-900 for headings, Slate-500 for secondary.

typography.rules: Headings must utilize Manrope for a distinct, geometric look. Never use Inter for H1/H2.

spacing.layout_rules: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Avoid equal-width columns where possible. Create hierarchy through size variation.

images.description: Confident female doctor smiling, conveys trust and ease.
images.usage: Landing page hero section or login side panel.

images.description: Male doctor in white coat, professional.
images.usage: User profile placeholder or testimonial avatar.
Subtle background for the 'Upload' or 'Scan' area to reduce visual noise.

icons.special_instructions: Use 'ScanLine' for QR, 'UploadCloud' for certificates, 'Award' for credits.

structure: Hero: col-span-full md:col-span-8 lg:col-span-8 (Progress Ring & Summary)
Secondary: col-span-full md:col-span-4 lg:col-span-4 (Upcoming Deadlines List)
Tertiary: col-span-full md:col-span-4 (Quick Upload / Scan Action)

certificate_list.style: Table for Desktop, Cards for Mobile.
certificate_list.interaction: Row click opens 'Detail Modal' with zoomed-in certificate view.

ocr_interface.right_panel: Form fields pre-filled with OCR data for verification.

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines. Use tooltips for values. Donut chart for progress.

scanner.ui: Full-screen overlay on mobile with a clear 'viewport' box.

upload.style: Dotted border container, large touch target, subtle hover animation.

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white rounded-lg shadow-sm font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-700 rounded-lg transition-all

motion.entrance: Fade in with slight upward slide (y-2 -> y-0).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-600+ on light backgrounds. WCAG AA compliant.
accessibility.focus: Visible ring-2 ring-indigo-500 ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.

do_not: Do NOT use generic 'blue' (#3B82F6) as the primary brand color.
Do NOT center text in the dashboard widgets (align left for readability).
must_do: Implement Dark Mode toggle but prioritize Light Mode polish.

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Install 'Manrope' font via Google Fonts or package.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Set up Tailwind colors to match the 'Clinical Zen' palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Build the Dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' layout specified.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Create a 'CertificateCard' component that handles the OCR status display (Processing/Verified).
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and empty states.
